content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll make sure to gradually increase my mileage and incorporate strength training into my workouts. I've also been trying to get more comfortable with my hiking gear, so I'll make sure to break in my boots and test out my backpack on shorter hikes. By the way, have you heard about any good day hikes in the Bay Area that I could do to prepare for my trip? I've already done a few hikes in Mount Tamalpais State Park and Mount Diablo State Park, but I'm looking for some new options.
